description.p: This API can be used to manage reports.
This API is only accesible for users having granted priviliges to work with reports.
Note, that the POST method can be simulated by using GET and adding the _method=POST parameter to the HTTP request.

method.summary: Retrieve a list of all Reports

parameter.name: user
parameter.description: A user's email address to filter reports owned by this user (i.e. all reports if user = authorized user or only public-read reports of user)

parameter.name: public-read
parameter.description: Filter listed reports to return only those that are publicly readable.

parameter.name: private
parameter.description: Filter listed reports to return only those that are private.

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or missing
Forbidden: the specified project token doesn't have sufficient privileges
Not found: a report id was given as parameter '_id', but a report with the specified id could not be found
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

example.title: Retrieve a specific report
example.description: Retrieve the schema for a specific report identified by its id. Return the result as JSON.

example.title: Retrieve all reports
example.description: Retrieve the schemas of all reports. Return the result as JSON.

method.summary: Add a new, update an existing report or validates a report on the fly

parameter.name: report
parameter.description: A JSON object containing the report

parameter.name: public-read
parameter.description: Shortcut to make a report publicly readable.

parameter.name: validation-only
parameter.description: This parameter is either given without any value (means: on) or absent (means: off) or its value is castable to a boolean. Turns validation-only mode on or off.

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session

error.description: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or missing
Forbidden: the specified project token doesn't have sufficient privileges
Bad Request: A mandatory parameter is missing or a given parameter is invalid
Conflict: The remotely stored report contains changes that are newer than your local copy of the report. Saving failed.
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Returns the report as it was stored. Or, the validation results in an array.

example.title: Add or replace a report
example.description: Add a new report or replace an existing one. Return the stored report as JSON.

example.title: Validate a report
example.description: Validate the structure of a report JSON object. Return warnings and errors in a JSON Array.

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: The token of the current session

error.description: Bad Request: a mandatory parameter is missing or a given parameter is not valid
Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or missing
Forbidden: the specified project token doesn't have sufficient privileges
Not found: a report id was given as parameter '_id', but a report with the specified id could not be found
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.
Report has been deleted. Empty response.

method.summary: Retrieve a list of all Report Parameters

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.description: Only retrieve values for this parameter

error.description: An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

example.title: Retrieve report parameters
example.description: Retrieve an object with parameter name fields and array values containing the parameter values.
